snippet.title: Matterhorn for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

Matterhorn is an arcade-style jump and run, where you, a mountain explorer, have to reach the peak at the mountain while avoiding deadly spears thrown by birds, rocks, and other hazards.

You can pick up weapons to shoot the birds and flowers that make you faster for a short time.


What I think:

Not bad, but damn hard.
